name: Edge of Reality: Ring of Destiny (Full) - Hidden
name_original: Edge of Reality: Ring of Destiny (Full) - Hidden
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

When you adopted Ice from the Lost Hope animal shelter, you thought you were picking your new best friend. Little did you know that you weren’t choosing him, but in fact he was choosing you! This little pup is actually from the magical world of Agora, and has been sent to find a human worthy of wielding the fabled Ring of Destiny!

• EMBARK ON THE ADVENTURE OF A LIFETIME!
This world, just on the edge of our reality, is being plagued by shadowy figures under the control of a malicious ruler. You’ll need some help if you’re going to save Agora!

• CAN YOU FOIL THE PLANS OF THIS SHADOW QUEEN?
Take the fight to her smoky minions through fantastic hidden object scenes.

• GET HELP FROM AGORA’S STRANGE CITIZENS
The folks you meet along the way will help solve fascinating puzzles and enchanted mini-games.

• DISCOVER GLIVERA’S PAST IN THE SPELLBINDING BONUS CHAPTER
Unlock her darkest secrets and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Dragons, special achievements, and more!
